Package com.BrickBreaker.gui

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
com.BrickBreaker.gui.GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class GameView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
This is the GameView class to show the game on the frame. This class is created to adhere MVC pattern
Since:
3/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alden Sia Zheng Heng
